scripts.allure:history: if exist allure-report\history rmdir /q /s allure-results\history && move /Y allure-report\history allure-results\history
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results del /q allure-results\*.* && if exist allure-report rmdir /q /s allure-report && if exist cypress\screenshots rmdir /q /s cypress\screenshots && if exist cypress\videos rmdir /q /s cypress\videos
scripts.test: npm run cypress:run || npm run posttest
